meanings.definition: To remove an obstruction from (a pipe, channel, etc.)
meanings.sent1: Dad unstops the sink with a plunger.
meanings.sent2: The plumber unstops the clogged drain quickly.
meanings.sent3: The water happily flows after I unstops the pipe.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter unstops the sadness in my heart.
meanings.sent5: The key to happiness is to unstops the worries from your mind.

meanings.definition: To cause to flow freely again
meanings.sent1: The rain unstops the dried-up river.
meanings.sent2: The medicine unstops my stuffy nose.
meanings.sent3: His joke unstops a wave of laughter in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her smile unstops the flood of memories in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The music unstops the emotions buried deep within me.

meanings.definition: To open or clear (something) by removing an obstruction
meanings.sent1: She unstops the bottle to pour the drink.
meanings.sent2: The janitor unstops the trash chute every morning.
meanings.sent3: The magician unstops the hat to reveal a rabbit inside.
meanings.sent4: His words unstops the path to understanding.
meanings.sent5: The key to success is to unstops the barriers in your way.
